This app is a port and front end of potrace on Android! Any problems or suggestions please email:
This is an open source project, more information please see:
This app requires write permission to your external storage. Please grant the permission.
This app requires write permission to your external storage. Please grant the permission from Settings and try again.

This app is an updated version of the potrace port from antrace. The app has been adapted from antrace to have a cleaner UI, and be able to be used for modern devices. NJIT/Rutgers students have contributed to the code as part of their senior capstones:
Finally - the author of antrace can be contacted through
The github can be found here:
For the future students that will be working on this project, good luck!
